title: A Spooky Fall
description: This year's Autumn/Winter Theme is The Fall Harvest. It is a busy time of year and in many cultures it is also a time of reflection. It is time to honor and pray for those lost, to give thanks for the past year's blessings, and to ask for guidance in the next spring season.The Peacock Writers are a group of authors from around the world that have joined together in the spirit of giving by offering their talents in stories, poems and artwork voluntarily. The proceeds from this book are donated to various charities. Please, join The Peacock Writers in making children's dreams come true.
author: The Peacock Writers
